User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private pages
Disallow: /blogmaker/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/

# Allow important files
Allow: /favicon.ico
Allow: /robots.txt
Allow: /sitemap.xml

# Sitemap will be auto-generated
